function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited funding for multidisciplinary research in robotics and infectious diseases","Impact":"Insufficient preparedness for future pandemics","Mitigation":"Increased funding and partnerships for research","Technologies":"Robotics, automation, AI for infectious disease management","People":"Researchers, engineers, infectious disease professionals","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, industry"},{"Description":"Dependence on sustained research efforts for robotics in infectious disease management","Impact":"Lack of readiness for future incidents","Mitigation":"Fusion of engineering and infectious disease professionals with dedicated funding","Technologies":"Robotics, automation, AI for infectious disease management","People":"Researchers, engineers, infectious disease professionals","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, industry"}]}
